Title: Einhell Power X-Change HEROCCO 18/20 18v Brushless Rotary Hammer Kit - 2x 4.0Ah
Description:
The Einhell HEROCCO 18/20 Kit Cordless Rotary Hammer delivers more power and provides longer operation times thanks to the brushless motor. Drilling, hammer drilling or chiselling with or without lock make it a valued allrounder.

The pneumatic impact mechanism makes effortless progress through concrete. Tools can be changed quickly thanks to the universal SDS-plus tool chuck with auto-slip-in function. The ergonomic grip area provides a firm soft grip hold. The LED light illuminates the work area.

Includes 1x magnetic bit adapter, a storage case (E-Box) and 2x 18V 4.0Ah Einhell Power X-Change rechargeable battery and charger.
 
Features
 
4+1 functions: Drilling/impact drilling/chiseling with & without lock
Pneumatic impact drilling in concrete (20mm)
Max. torque: 18Nm
Impact rate: 2.2J
Vibration-cushioned handle

Includes 
 
2X 4.0AH Batteries 
1X magnetic bit adapter and a transport and storage case (E-Box)
1X Fast Charger
